sqlMap.select:
select dt.id, dt.contract_product_detail_id, dt.delivery_infor_id, dt.project_code, dt.serial_number, dt.brand_code, dt.tools_id, dt.parent_tools_id, dt.leaf, dt.product_name, dt.product_code, dt.contract_amount, dt.amount, dt.net_price, dt.product_unit, dt.product_money, dt.memo, dt.source_type, dt.source_id, dt.contract_project_sort_id, dt.pro_sort_name,dt.product_brand, (select sum(tdt.amount) from t_delivery_detail tdt,t_delivery_infor di where tdt.delivery_infor_id = di.id and di.status != 4 and tdt.contract_product_detail_id = dt.contract_product_detail_id) all_delivery_amount, (select sum(ot.amount) from t_out_stock_detail ot,t_out_stock_infor oinfor where ot.out_stock_infor_id = oinfor.id and oinfor.status = 1 and ot.contract_product_detail_id = dt.contract_product_detail_id) all_arrival_amount from t_delivery_detail dt
order by $orderByClause$

select det.id, det.contract_product_detail_id, det.delivery_infor_id, det.project_code, det.serial_number, det.brand_code, det.tools_id, det.parent_tools_id, det.leaf, det.product_name, det.product_code, det.contract_amount, det.amount, det.net_price, det.product_unit, det.product_money, det.memo, det.source_type, det.source_id, det.contract_project_sort_id, det.pro_sort_name,0 all_delivery_amount,0 all_arrival_amount,det.product_brand from t_delivery_detail det where det.id = #id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_delivery_detail (id, contract_product_detail_id, delivery_infor_id, project_code, serial_number, brand_code, tools_id, parent_tools_id, leaf, product_name, product_code, contract_amount, amount, net_price, product_unit, product_money, memo, source_type, source_id, contract_project_sort_id, pro_sort_name,product_brand) values (#id:VARCHAR#, #contractProductDetailId:VARCHAR#, #deliveryInforId:VARCHAR#, #projectCode:VARCHAR#, #serialNumber:DECIMAL#, #brandCode:VARCHAR#, #toolsId:VARCHAR#, #parentToolsId:VARCHAR#, #leaf:INTEGER#, #productName:VARCHAR#, #productCode:VARCHAR#, #contractAmount:DECIMAL#, #amount:DECIMAL#, #netPrice:DECIMAL#, #productUnit:VARCHAR#, #productMoney:DECIMAL#, #memo:VARCHAR#, #sourceType:INTEGER#, #sourceId:VARCHAR#, #contractProjectSortId:VARCHAR#, #proSortName:VARCHAR#,#productBrand:VARCHAR#)

)
values

update t_delivery_detail

contract_product_detail_id = #record.contractProductDetailId:VARCHAR#
delivery_infor_id = #record.deliveryInforId:VARCHAR#

pro_sort_name = #record.proSortName:VARCHAR#

update t_delivery_detail set id = #record.id:VARCHAR#, contract_product_detail_id = #record.contractProductDetailId:VARCHAR#, delivery_infor_id = #record.deliveryInforId:VARCHAR#, project_code = #record.projectCode:VARCHAR#, serial_number = #record.serialNumber:DECIMAL#, brand_code = #record.brandCode:VARCHAR#, tools_id = #record.toolsId:VARCHAR#, parent_tools_id = #record.parentToolsId:VARCHAR#, leaf = #record.leaf:INTEGER#, product_name = #record.productName:VARCHAR#, product_code = #record.productCode:VARCHAR#, contract_amount = #record.contractAmount:DECIMAL#, amount = #record.amount:DECIMAL#, net_price = #record.netPrice:DECIMAL#, product_unit = #record.productUnit:VARCHAR#, product_money = #record.productMoney:DECIMAL#, memo = #record.memo:VARCHAR#, source_type = #record.sourceType:INTEGER#, source_id = #record.sourceId:VARCHAR#, contract_project_sort_id = #record.contractProjectSortId:VARCHAR#, pro_sort_name = #record.proSortName:VARCHAR#, product_brand = #record.productBrand:VARCHAR#
